00011 int odb_connect(char *format, ...)
00012 {
00013   char s[MAX_ODB_PATH];
00014   int  status;
00015   HNDLE hKey;
00016 
00017   va_list argp;
00018   va_start(argp, format);
00019   vsprintf(s, format, argp);
00020   va_end(argp);
00021   
00022   /* connect to experiment */
00023   status = cm_connect_experiment("pc620", "muCap", s, NULL);
00024   if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
00025     return 0;
00026 
00027   /* get handle to online database */
00028   cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, &hKey);
00029 
00030   return SUCCESS;
00031 }

00055 {
00056   char s[MAX_ODB_PATH];

00062   va_end(argp);

00064   size = sizeof(retval);

00066                         TID_INT, TRUE);
